text: April 26, 2018 / 11:43 PM / Updated 13 hours ago IPL Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Min Read Apr 26 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play on the first day of match 25 between Sunrisers Hyderabad and Kings XI Punjab on Thursday at Hyderabad, India Sunrisers Hyderabad win by 13 runs Sunrisers Hyderabad 1st innings Shikhar Dhawan c Karun Nair b Ankit Rajpoot 11 Kane Williamson c Ravichandran Ashwin b Ankit Rajpoot 0 Wriddhiman Saha c Andrew Tye b Ankit Rajpoot 6 Manish Pandey b Ankit Rajpoot 54 Shakib Al Hasan c Mayank Agarwal b Mujeeb Ur Rahman 28 Yusuf Pathan Not Out 21 Mohammad Nabi c Mayank Agarwal b Ankit Rajpoot 4 Extras 1b 1lb 1nb 0pen 5w 8 Total (20.0 overs) 132-6 Fall of Wickets : 1-1 Williamson, 2-16 Dhawan, 3-27 Saha, 4-79 Al Hasan, 5-128 Pandey, 6-132 Nabi Did Not Bat : Khan, Thampi, Kaul, Sharma Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Ankit Rajpoot 4 0 14 5 3.50 Barinder Sran 3 0 27 0 9.00 1nb Ravichandran Ashwin 4 0 34 0 8.50 Manoj Tiwary 1 0 10 0 10.00 1w Mujeeb Ur Rahman 4 0 17 1 4.25 1w Andrew Tye 4 0 28 0 7.00 Kings XI Punjab 1st innings Lokesh Rahul b Rashid Khan 32 Chris Gayle c&b Basil Thampi 23 Mayank Agarwal c Manish Pandey b Shakib Al Hasan 12 Karun Nair lbw Rashid Khan 13 Aaron Finch c Manish Pandey b Shakib Al Hasan 8 Manoj Tiwary c Kane Williamson b Sandeep Sharma 1 Ravichandran Ashwin c Kane Williamson b Rashid Khan 4 Andrew Tye lbw Sandeep Sharma 4 Barinder Sran Run Out Wriddhiman Saha 2 Ankit Rajpoot b Basil Thampi 8 Mujeeb Ur Rahman Not Out 10 Extras 1b 1lb 0nb 0pen 0w 2 Total (19.2 overs) 119 all out Fall of Wickets : 1-55 Rahul, 2-57 Gayle, 3-77 Agarwal, 4-82 Nair, 5-88 Finch, 6-92 Tiwary, 7-96 Tye, 8-99 Sran, 9-101 Ashwin, 10-119 Rajpoot Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Sandeep Sharma 4 0 17 2 4.25 Mohammad Nabi 2 0 24 0 12.00 Siddarth Kaul 4 0 25 0 6.25 Basil Thampi 2.2 0 14 2 6.00 Rashid Khan 4 0 19 3 4.75 Shakib Al Hasan 3 0 18 2 6.00 Umpire Yeshwant Barde Umpire C Nandan Video Rodney Tucker Match Referee Javagal Srinath
